resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74449</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74449</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3de9d07e-bfdb-4691-9d6d-f2d1a316b4a0#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Állítsd össze a képet</string>
            <string language="en">Put together the picture!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengefügt der Abbildung!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remonté l'image !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido o retrato!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito l'immagine!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε μαζί την εικόνα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Juntado el cuadro!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Rákóczi-szabadságharc</string>
            <string language="en">The Rákóczi's insurrection</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, Kurucok és labancok harca, kuruc labanc, festmény, Rákóczi szabadságharc</string>
            <string language="en">history, fighting of kuruc and labanc, kuruc (soldier in the insurrectionist armies of Imre Thököly and Ferenc Rákóczi fighting against Hapsburg oppression at the turn of the 17th century, person siding/sympathizing with the nationalist cause (in Rákóczi's times)), labanc (nickname of pro-Austrian soldiers during the 18th century Hungarian wars of independence), painting, The Rákóczi's insurrection</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufstand des Rákóczis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'insurrection du Rákóczi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O insurrection do Rákóczi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il insurrection del Rákóczi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εξέγερση του Rαkσczi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La insurrección del Rákóczi</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, Kämpfen von kuruc und labanc, kuruc (Soldat
in den insurrectionist Armeen Imre Thököly und Ferenc Rákóczi 
fighting.against Hapsburg der Unterdrückung an der Umdrehung des 17. 
Jahrhunderts, der Person siding/sympathisierte mit der nationalistischen 
Ursache (in den Zeiten Rákóczis)), labanc (Spitzname der 
Pro-Österreichischen Soldaten während der ungarischen Kriege des 18.
Jahrhunderts von Unabhängigkeit), malend, der Aufstand des 
Rákóczis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire, combat du kuruc et labanc, kuruc (soldat dans 
les armées d'insurrectionist de l'oppression d'Imre Thököly et de 
Ferenc Rákóczi fighting.against Hapsburg à la fin du 17ème 
siècle, de la personne siding/sympathizing avec la cause nationaliste
(dans les temps de Rákóczi)), labanc (surnom des soldats 
pro-Autrichiens pendant les guerres hongroises de 18ème siècle de 
l'indépendance), peignant, l'insurrection du Rákóczi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history, luta do kuruc e labanc, kuruc (soldado nos 
exércitos do insurrectionist de Imre Thököly e de Ferenc Rákóczi 
que lutam de encontro ao oppression de Hapsburg na volta do 17os 
século, pessoa siding/sympathizing com a causa nacionalista (em 
tempos de Rákóczi)), labanc (nickname de soldados pro-pro-Austrian 
durante as guerras hungarian do 18o século da independência), 
pintando, o insurrection do Rákóczi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia, combattimento di kuruc e labanc, kuruc (soldato 
negli eserciti di insurrectionist di combattimento di Imre Thököly e 
di Ferenc Rákóczi contro il oppression di Hapsburg alla fine del 
diciassettesimo secolo, della persona siding/sympathizing con la causa
nazionalista (nei tempi del Rákóczi)), labanc (nickname dei soldati 
pro-Austriaci durante le guerre ungheresi di diciottesimo secolo di 
indipendenza), verniciante, il insurrection del Rákóczi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία, πάλη του kuruc και labanc, kuruc 
(στρατιώτης στους στρατούς insurrectionist του Imre 
Thφkφly και του Ferenc Rαkσczi που παλεύουν ενάντια 
Hapsburg στην κατοχή στο γύρισμα του 17$ου αιώνα, του προσώπου 
που πλαισιώνουν/που συμμερίζονται την εθνικιστική αιτία (στους 
χρόνους Rαkσczi)), labanc (παρωνύμιο των υπέρ-αυστριακών 
στρατιωτών κατά τη διάρκεια των ουγγρικών επαναστάσεων του 18$ου 
αιώνα), που χρωματίζουν, η εξέγερση του Rαkσczi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia, el luchar del kuruc y labanc, kuruc (soldado 
en los ejércitos del insurrectionist de Imre Thököly y de Ferenc 
Rákóczi que luchan contra la opresión de Hapsburg al final del 17mo
siglo, la persona siding/sympathizing con la causa nacionalista (en 
los tiempos de Rákóczi)), labanc (apodo de soldados 
favorable-Austri'acos durante las guerras húngaras del décimo octavo
siglo de la independencia), pintando, la insurrección del Rákóczi</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74449</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
